identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Ancient Natya Shastra aesthetics with Cyberpunk AI visuals.
Emotion First: The UI must feel like a performance—dramatic, intense, and precise.
Content is King: The dance video is the hero; the AI story is the narrator.
Zoom In: Focus on the micro-expressions (Abhinaya) and hand gestures (Mudras).
Negative Space: Allow the intricate dance movements to breathe.
anti_patterns: No flat, lifeless lists for the story output.

usage.h1: font-heading text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none text-foreground
usage.h2: font-heading text-3xl md:text-5xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-foreground/90
usage.caption: font-mono text-xs tracking-wider uppercase text-muted-foreground/60

grids.landing_hero: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-8 min-h-[90vh] items-center
grids.dashboard_main: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-4 h-[calc(100vh-4rem)] p-4

bento_dashboard.video_player: col-span-1 lg:col-span-8 row-span-2 bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative
bento_dashboard.story_panel: col-span-1 lg:col-span-4 row-span-2 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border/50 rounded-xl p-6 overflow-y-auto
bento_dashboard.timeline: col-span-1 lg:col-span-8 row-span-1 bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-xl p-4
bento_dashboard.stats: col-span-1 lg:col-span-4 row-span-1 bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-xl p-4

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(217,56,30,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(217,56,30,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-secondary text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/10 rounded-sm px-6 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300

cards.solid: bg-card border border-border shadow-lg hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: bg-muted/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm h-12 px-4

visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use subtle radial gradients behind key elements (like the video player) to create depth.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (10-20%) for a technical, precise look.
visual_enhancers.skeletal_overlay: Use the 'ai_tech' color (#06B6D4) for skeletal lines and dots on the video overlay.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature highlights.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.story_text_reveal: initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use lighter greys (#A1A1AA) on dark backgrounds, never dark grey.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using the 'accent' color (#06B6D4).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and fonts defined above.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark theme and global font styles.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the Bento Grid layout defined in 'layout.grids.bento_dashboard'.
5. Use the 'hero_bg' image for the Landing Page hero section with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/70) to ensure text readability.
6. The 'Story Panel' should feel like a script or a book—use serif fonts for the generated story text.
7. Ensure the Video Player is the focal point. Everything else supports it.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center-align long blocks of text.
Avoid 'AI slop'—generic, template-like designs. Be bold with spacing and typography.
